title: MSR problems illustrative of challenges for NASA flagship missions, audit concludes
summary: As decision loom about its funding and architecture, a NASA review about the Mars Sample Return (MSR) program concluded its problems illustrate ongoing challenges the agency has managing large missions.

title: Former NASA Administrator Richard Truly Passes Away
